name: com.novalabs.fk-tools
description:
I have created a set of tools to use for my unity projects. One is an event system to communicate between scripts without direct reference. 
Two is a log system that will show logs and popup(if needed) while I'm testing my game on a mobile device where I can't see unity's console and some custom attribute classes. 

Also I will be modifying and adding more tools as I need.
